name: The Dark Side of the Light
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you control a [Holy] card, draw a card. If you control a [Shadow] card, draw a card.
flavour: Little did I know of the dark truth to these fanatics. - Joseph the Awakened

name: Battle for the Scarlet Monastery
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each other card you control with Scarlet in its name.
flavour: Sylvanas extends the honor of slaying her last remainig enemies to you. - Dark Ranger Velonara

name: Hand of Righteousness
rules: 1 -> Damage that target hero or ally would deal this turn is unpreventable.
flavour: The Light has spoken! - High Inquisitor Whitemane

name: Meteor Shard
rules: When you strike with this weapon, you may reveal the top card of target opponent's deck. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment with cost 4 or less, this weapon has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Mograine's Might
rules: When a [Holy] ally enters play under your control, this weapon has +X ATK this turn, where X is that ally's ATK.

name: Odo's Ley Staff
rules: When you draw a card, you hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Smite's Reaver
rules: When your strike with this weapon, you may exhaust target hero or ally.;When you strike with this weapon for the first time each turn, you may ready it and your hero at the end of this combat.
flavour: You landlubbers are tougher than I thought. I'll have to improvise! - Mr. Smite

name: Cookie's Tenderizer
rules: When your hero deals combat damage to a hero or ally with this weapon, allies you control have +1 ATK while attacking that character this turn.

name: Emberstone Staff
rules: When you play an ability, you may add an emberstone counter to this weapon.;This weapon has +1 ATK and you pay 1 less to strike with it for each emberstone counter on it.

name: Arced War Axe
rules: You pay 3 less to strike with this weapon while you control three or more allies.
flavour: Intruders in the keep! To arms! - Commander Springvale

name: Butcher's Cleaver
rules: This weapon has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking a hero with 15 or more damage.
flavour: Ah, fresh meat!

name: Buzzer Blade
rules: Dual Wield (You can control a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipmant. You can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.);When your hero deals fatal damage to an ally while attacking, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: Sploded dat one! - Glubtok

name: Fel Steed Saddlebags
rules: When you place a resource, if you control exactly four resources, draw a card.;When you place a resource, if you control exactly eight resources, destroy this item. If you do, draw a card.

name: Dog Whistle
rules: When this item enters play, put a 2 [Melee] / 2 [Health] Hound ally token into play with Protector.;On your turn: 4, [Exhaust] -> Put a 2 [Melee] / 2 [Health] Hound ally token into play with Protector.

name: Phantom Armor
rules: This armor can prevent only melee ([Melee]) damage.
flavour: You shall annoy me no longer! - Lord Walden

name: Robes of Arugal
rules: When an ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, it may deal 1 arcane damage to target hero.

name: Deadman's Hand
rules: Allies you control have Assault 1 while an opponent controls more allies than you.

name: Aegis of the Scarlet Commander
rules: When this armor prevents damage, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero.

name: Defias Brotherhood Vest
rules: While you control four or more allies, allies you control have Assault 1 and Stealth.
flavour: The Defias Brotherhood is determined to wreak havoc upon, and ultimately destroy, the House of Nobles in Stormwind City.

name: Chain of the Scarlet Crusade
rules: At the start of your turn, add a scarlet counter to this armor.;Your hero and allies you control have Assault 1 for each scarlet counter.
subtype3: Chest (1), Wrist (1), Hands (1), Waist (1), Legs (1), Feet (1)

name: Prototype Reaper
rules: When this ally enters play, leaves play, exhausts, or readies, it may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.

name: Captain Cookie
rules: As Cookie enters play, reveal the top five cards of your deck. Remove all revealed Murlocs from the game and put the rest on the bottom of your deck.;Cookie enters play with printed power of all Murlocs removed this way.

name: Mercenary Dominic
rules: Once per turn: 2 -> Your hero has Assault 2 this turn. (It has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Let's not play games. Are they dead or not?

name: Scarlet Commander Renault Mograine
rules: Protector;If Renault would be dealt damage while defending, you may have any amount of it dealt to your hero instead.
flavour: Infidels. They must be purified.

name: Vanessa VanCleef
rules: Stealth, Untargetable;When Vanessa enters play, she may deal 4 nature damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: I will not share my father's fate!

name: Mining Monkey
rules: When this ally enters play, each friendly player may draw a card (including you).

name: Baron Ashbury
rules: When Ashbury enters play, he deals shadow damage to each opposing ally equal to that ally's remaining [Health] -1.
flavour: Ha! Let's at least keep it interesting.

name: Lord Godfrey
rules: At the start of your turn, put two 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.;At the end of your turn, Godfrey deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally for each Ghoul you control.
flavour: Murder never gets old.

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
rules: When Whitemane attacks, you may put target ally from your graveyard on top of your deck. She heals damage from your hero equal to the cost of that ally.
flavour: The Light has spoken!

name: Herod, The Scarlet Champion
rules: At the start of your turn, choose one: This turn, Herod has +3 ATK and attacks opposing heroes and allies at random; or Herod attacks normally this turn.
flavour: Blades of Light!

name: Edwin VanCleef
rules: Stealth, Untargetable;When Edwin enters play, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Defias Thug ally token into play with This ally can protect allies with VanCleef in their names.;When Edwin is destroyed, you may put an ally named Vanessa VanCleef from your hand into play.
flavour: None may challenge the Brotherhood!

name: Shattered Hand Assassin
rules: Stealth;When this ally enters play, exhaust target opposing ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Admiral Ripsnarl
rules: Ferocity, Stealth;At the start of each turn, if Ripsnarl is damaged, you may put him into his owner's hand.
flavour: I will rip your heart from your chest!

name: Alexandros Mograine
rules: Protector;When Alexandros is destroyed, you may put a 6 [Holy] / 0 [Cost] Two-Handed Sword weapon token named Ashbringer into play with Melee(1) and Invincible.
flavour: The Ashbringer...

name: Archmage Arugal
rules: Elusive;When Arugal enters play, gain control of target opposing ally while Arugal remains under your control.;While you control that ally, it has +4 / +4.
flavour: You, too, shall serve!

name: Kagtha
rules: Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have Elusive and Untargetable.
flavour: The Shattered Hand has laid mostly quiet for years now... No more!

name: Deathstalker Commander Belmont
rules: On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Allies you control with cost 4 or less have +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: I've sent my men forward on the rooftops to secure the area around Lord Walden.

name: Forsaken Blightspreader
rules: When this ally deals damage to an opposing ally, destroy that ally.

name: Forsaken Royal Dreadguard
rules: At the start of your turn, this ally deals 1 melee damage to target hero for each Forsaken Royal Dreadguard you and other friendly players control (including himself).

name: High Warlord Cromush
rules: Protector (Cromush may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attaks.);While Cromush has exactly 1 remaining [Health], he has Assault 10.
flavour: You'll see the Warchief's wrath first hand.

name: Stormwind Investigator
rules: When this ally enters play, you may look at the top card of target player's deck. You may put that card into his graveyard.
flavour: I won't get fooled again.

name: Lieutenant Horatio Laine
rules: At the end of your turn, target opponent reveals the top card of his deck. If it's an ally, remove it from the game. If it's a weapon, you may put it into play under your control.
flavour: I guess that's the way... the Cookie crumbles.

name: Poison Tipped
rules: Ongoing: When a Rogue ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, your hero dels 2 nature damage to each opposing hero.

name: Stargaze
rules: Ongoing: When a Duid enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, target player draw a card.

name: Packleader Ivar Bloodfang
rules: Aberration;Once per turn: Growl -> Allies you control have Assault 2 this turn.
flavour: My men should be tearing Godfrey to pieces even as we speak.

name: Scarlet Renegade
rules: This ally has Assault 1 for each Scarlet Renegade you and other friendly players control (including himself).

name: Crime Scene Alarm-O-Bot
rules: Protector;When an opposing hero or ally attacks, you may ready this ally.

name: Bloodfang Berserker
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.);This ally has +2 ATK while attacking a damaged hero or ally.

name: Bestial Instinct
rules: Ongoing: When a Hunter ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, target ally has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Nice kitty... Good kitty... - Zunjo of Sen'jin

name: Cover of the Light
rules: Ongoing: When a Paladin ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, it heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Earthen Guidance
rules: Ongoing: When a Shaman ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, it deals 2 nature damage to target opposing ally.

name: Executioners Strikes
rules: Ongoing: When a Warrior ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, you may destroy target damaged ally.

name: Faithful Prayer
rules: Ongoing: When a Priest ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, it heals 1 damaged from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Focused Flames
rules: Ongoing: When a Mage ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, it deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally.

name: Hand of Frost
rules: Ongoing: When a Death Knight ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, target hero or ally has Assault 2 this turn.

name: Nether Blast
rules: Ongoing: When a Warlock ally enters play under your control or a friendly player's control, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target opposing hero and heals damage from itself equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: The Defias Kingpin
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each opposing ally in play.;On your turn: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Slay the Defias Kingpin and commandeer her ship! - Kagtha

name: The Deadmines
rules: If an ally you controlled was destroyed this turn: [Exhaust] -> Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavour: Deep beneath Moonbrook lie the Deadmines, a place of secrets and dark treachery.

name: Scarlet Monastery
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally that was healed this turn has Assault 2 this turn.
flavour: With the rise of the Scourge during the Third War, this peaceful monastery was converted into a stronghold of the fanatical Scarlet Crusade.

name: Shadowfang Keep
rules: [Exhaust], Destroy an ally you control -> You pay 2 less to play your next ally this turn.
flavour: Once the domain of the archmage Arugal, the kepp's new lord and master is the renegade forsaken Lord Vincent Godfrey.

name: Edwin VanCleef
rules: Stealth, Untargetable;When Edwin enters play, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Defias Thug ally token into play with This ally can protect allies with VanCleef in their names.;When Edwin is destroyed, you may put an ally named Vanessa VanCleef from your hand into play.
flavour: None may challenge the Brotherhood!

name: Edwin VanCleef
rules: Stealth, Untargetable;When Edwin enters play, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Defias Thug ally token into play with This ally can protect allies with VanCleef in their names.;When Edwin is destroyed, you may put an ally named Vanessa VanCleef from your hand into play.
flavour: None may challenge the Brotherhood!
